System Namespace Reference

Detailed Description

Contains System related stuff.

For internal use only.

File: Contains helpers for object releasing


Classes

class  Exception
struct  ReleaseFunctor
struct  ReleaseArrayFunctor
class  SingletonStatic
 Base class to create static singletons. This means that its creation/destruction cycle is not controlled. If you need to control the creation/destruction of the singleton use the Singleton class. More...
class  Singleton
 Base class to create controlled singletons. In this class the creation and destruction of the singleton are controlled. The creation occurs with the first getSingleton call, and the destruction when the method destroySingleton is called. More...
